statements: SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_contact_number FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, patient_address FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 AND patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, patient_contact_number, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_age < 18 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, encrypted_data FROM patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 'aaa11111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111'
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr.%'
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time > '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_id=1;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE Patients.patient_gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, BlockchainData.blockchain_hash FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN BlockchainData ON Patients.patient_id = BlockchainData.patient_id WHERE Patients.patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';

SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM patients WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, license_number FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, start_time, end_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty ASC;

SELECT doctor_name, record_date, diagnosis FROM Doctors JOIN MedicalRecords ON Doctors.doctor_id = MedicalRecords.doctor_id ORDER BY record_date DESC;
